courses.name: Wrongful Convictions

courses.name: Issues in Criminal Law: Hist Evol & Theo
Aboriginal People and the Criminal Justice System
courses.desc: This course examines Aboriginal concepts of justice. It critically analyzes the relationship between Aboriginal people and the Canadian criminal justice system at different stages and through various lenses.
